channel.title: Service on Joel Mackenzie
channel.description: Recent content in Service on Joel Mackenzie

item.title: Service
item.description: Organisation I am a resources co-chair for SIGIR 2026 with Lorraine Goeuriot which will be held in Melbourne. I was a short paper co-chair for SIGIR 2025 with Ebrahim Bagheri and Faegheh Hasibi which was held in Padua, Italy. I was a program co-chair for ADCS 2022 with Maciek Rybinski which was held at Flinders University in Adelaide. Damiano Spina and I were the general chairs of ADCS 2021 which was held as a virtual seminar series.
